name: Run For Cover (itch)
description:
My 7 week quarter-long project for GAM 355 based on my third playable interaction. I took inspiration from The Killers' "Run For Cover" song and will be posting all future updates here.

Objective: Survive as long as you can by avoiding obstacles/enemies and not going off screen.

Controller (recommended) and Keyboard supported: WASD move or Arrow keys or Joystick/D-pad

R to restart game

Escape to quit game

All coding and other art/audio assets created by me in Visual Studio 2017, Photoshop CC 2017, and Audacity.
